website_summaries.verdict: An ultra-light, easily collapsible, quick-charging, and feature-packed folding electric bike, this is an excellent option for effortlessly traversing shorter distances.
pros: Features a 10-mile range on a full charge
Safety headlight, horn, brake light, and reflectors
cons: A 10-mile range is fun, but since the max speed is only 10 miles per hour, it’ll take you an hour to reach that point

customer_reviews.title: Horrible experience
customer_reviews.text: Horrifying experience with swagtron. 2 days after receiving the product the rear wheel popped after a manufacturers defect. I tried to submit a claim 4 times with a continued “dear valued customer” response and after filling the laborious on line form out 3 times still cannot ride the bike. I simply wanted a rear tire inner tube which you cannot order on line, very frustrating, product gets a zero rating from me
customer_reviews.author: Jemi9

customer_reviews.title: defective on arrival
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 2 Swagcycles. Both were defective with the same problem the throttle did not work. We called Swagtron and frankly they were clueless. We won't be ordering a third one.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Glaring design flaws with this product.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this product would be great except for a glaring design flaw: The valve stem on the back wheel is pushed right up against the metal plate on the back wheel, so it's extremely hard to get the valve cap off and you CANNOT fill it with air. I just found this out after getting it today for myself and it's infuriating. I already sent them an e-mail but I don't expect to hear back from them until after xmas, so I'm going to go look for a Valve Stem Extender tomorrow and hopefully that'll fix my issue.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: I made it where I was going.
customer_reviews.text: I just made my first real trip on it. I bought this because I work 2.5 miles from work and yes I could walk but then I would be hot and sweaty at work. I have been taking lyft and really wanted stop wasting that money. I made it ok to work. Doesn't go up hills well nut my ride is mostly flat. It drove well enough and I still had a mostly full charge when I got to work. I did feel a little ridiculous but ridiculous or not I made it and saved that bit of money.
customer_reviews.author: Coral

customer_reviews.title: I recommend taking that into consideration when purchasing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son to get around a very large college campus. He used it for 3 weeks before he hit a bump and now its sitting in his dorm room, unable to be used because the front tire is completely damaged. This company does not sell replacement parts. You are responsible for shipping the item to and from Indiana for any repairs. I recommend taking that into consideration when purchasing. Wishing I would have spent a bit more money on a better quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Devine

customer_reviews.title: Cool little thing
customer_reviews.text: I've used this to get to work 5 days a week. 5.5 miles one way, 11 miles round trip, for over a month now. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This little cycle is bad ass!
customer_reviews.text: This little cycle is bad ass!!! I am 190 lbs and I was laughing while zipping through the area where I live. ( a downtown area) . Uphill is a challenge, but nothing that a couple of foot kicks won't help. Also, the power returns to almost full after a hill. I am probably going to order a second because my 14 year old son and I are tired of taking turns!!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Brown

customer_reviews.title: If it has electrical problems be prepared to trash it.
customer_reviews.text: Like others that purchased this bike if you have a flat be prepared to have a difficult time finding or replacing the inner tube. If you are able to fix the flat and a month down the road you have electrical problems, be prepared to throw it in the trash. You can't take it to get it fixed anywhere. Sadly I learned this after the warranty expired. It was fun bike while it lasted wish it had better customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel V.

customer_reviews.title: Ripoff
customer_reviews.text: One star because zeo is not an option. After 8 months and approximtely 16 to 20 charges the battery will now not charge at all. A total waste of money. Who sells a product like this without a way to replace the battery. Ship it to the manufacturer....ridiculous! And I really loved it when it worked.
customer_reviews.author: NancyG

customer_reviews.title: Beside the weak factory rear tire problem, this is a solid product.
customer_reviews.text: It's the 8th month I've been using this bike. I am satisfied. I use it outdoor to commute within a large community. So far it has not shown a sign of degrading, still one solid piece. NOTE: make sure the tire pressure is high as the marking on the tire. Underpressure tires will break! Tire problem: the factory rear tire WILL break in the 1st week of use, go buy a heavy duty same size tire on Amazon and be ready for it. After you change out the rear tire and get pass the 1st frustration, it is gonna a long smooth ride. Also, the factory front tire hasn't broken yet.
customer_reviews.author: LonelyNineSword

customer_reviews.title: Whats the Bluetooth password?
customer_reviews.text: Fun ride, im about 215lbs and wish it was a little peppier. I can almost hear the rear wheel begging me to get off. Strangers always stop me to ask how much and where I got it from. This is perfect for hatching Pokemon Go eggs and cruising to different gyms. I noticed the E bike emits a Bluetooth connection. with the Bike on, use your phone to discover BT devices. Unfortunately I dont know what the password is. I contacted Swagtron and they said there is no BT connection on this model. Can anyone else verify? Comes up as P1-xxxxx
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Flat Surfaces Yes, Hills NO.
customer_reviews.text: "Push the Swagcycle to its 10 MPH limit on the hill and zip past other bikers struggling to pedal, or dash through city streets as you effortlessly fly past all the other cars stuck in traffic." Cannot go up 95% of the hills and speed is not as advertised. Best for flat surfaces only.

customer_reviews.title: Great E-Bike but needs upgrades
customer_reviews.text: I Really like the SwagCycle. Build quality is great for the price. Have the brakes adjusted if they are not tight enough when you receive yours. If you are not mechanically inclined have a local bike shop do it. I wish the SwagCycle had a larger battery or a way to upgrade to a larger battery for more range. The cycle could also use more torque to propel you uphill. Even modest hills can slow it down some. Hopefully they will come out with another model.
customer_reviews.author: RN

customer_reviews.title: Back Tire Valve Difficult to Attach Pump
customer_reviews.text: After I bought the bike I found out that there is a common problem with the back tire air valve being too close to the rim in order to screw on a pump. Solution: I used a screw driver to push the valve out just enough to screw in an angled adapter valve. I bought a pack of 6 for just $12. I was then able to inflate the tire and then take off the adapter. The adapter looks just like the valve already built into the front tire. TK-KLZ 6-Pack Chrome 45 Degree 90 Degree 135 Degree Angled Wheel Tire Tyre Valve Stem Extension Adapter for Car Motorcycle Bike Truck RV's Scooter Universal Extenders
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A

customer_reviews.title: Every grandparent should have this!
customer_reviews.text: My best purchase ever! I can finally bike with the grandkids without running out of air!
customer_reviews.author: gamma24

customer_reviews.title: Poor Customer Service and Product
customer_reviews.text: There is a wrong tube in the back tire. It is impossible to blow air into the tire tube unless you take it to a place with a compressor to pump air into the wheel. Swagtron does not pay to ship their own products under warranty back to them for warranty repair. It'll cost me $100 dollars on a $375 bike to ship it to them for repair. Poor customer service. It is really slow at 10 miles per hour. All the cyclists will pass you by. Not worth the price tag. Please do your research before buying this product--many more options are available out there now.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Really like it overall, but range less than stated
customer_reviews.text: I ride this to work every day, which is about 3 miles round trip... and for short trips like that, it's perfect. However, I tested the range and this doesn't go 10 miles if you're driving the max speed (which you'll normally be doing the entire trip because the max speed isn't very fast). Not even close. I got just less than 6 miles from full charge. And that was without the headlight being on, which drains even more... so be careful on the range, especially when you'll be riding at night when you'll need the headlight.
customer_reviews.author: phoenixalaska

customer_reviews.title: It's for kids too
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter's 11th birthday... She loves it...it's lightweight and safe....fast enough to keep her interest and slow enough for me to allow her to ride it around the park and neighborhood without fear.
customer_reviews.author: L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Cool little scooter, not most comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Just got it yesterday and riding it around today. I've have had a few people ask about it and where I got it. Funny looking little thing. The battery didn't list too long on the first run but I'm hoping it gets better every charge cycle. The seat isn't the most comfortable. I love the overall look of it as it goes with my headphones. This thing is cool and I hope it last long.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Jack

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I got this to retrieve the mail, which is up a hill from our house. I am near the weight limit for this bike, so it struggles getting me up the hill, but it gets me there. Coming back is no problem! While not great, it does the job I got it for. And I saw the specs before I bought, so the performance is not a surprise. One note: When it arrived, one tire had to be fit back onto the rim, and both needed air. Be sure to check the tires before you try to ride it.
customer_reviews.author: Wizard Leather

customer_reviews.title: Great for Short distance local riding!
customer_reviews.text: Very useful for short distances, does not go as fast as claimed but does the job well. Battery life is good but should have an option to have a spare battery to pop in when you're on low. Works for me since I have a bad leg to run errands locally, its lightweight so it's easy to carry up / down stairs. All in all I recommend this for folks that cant walk long distances & for those that aren't in a hurry. Hope to see more power options & extended battery life in future models!
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo R.

customer_reviews.title: I love this little thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this little thing, I use it every day to get over to my lab (I'm a grad student). It folds up and fits perfectly under my desk, which is great. It feels a little silly zooming around on it, but overall it's a fun device. Note: I would not recommend this for kids. It accelerates really quickly and I've hurt myself a couple of times and even fallen off of it. Now, I'm kind of a klutz, but I still wouldn't feel good about anyone younger than like 13 riding this.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Sanders

customer_reviews.title: I just got my E-Bike for my son and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got my E-Bike for my son and the seat attachment is missing i can't install the seat and now he has to wait or i will have to return it Don't swagtron have quality checks were they make sure all the parts are included? i will wait for there reply
customer_reviews.author: Aisha

customer_reviews.title: BALLIN BUT YOU MUST READ  IM HANDY AF
customer_reviews.text: loveeeee the bike do not like tire tubes they pop hella easy if you go over ANYY glass or sometimes stickers POPPED 1 WITHIN AN HOUR TODAYY AFTER JUST GOT IT TIRE PRESSURE IS ALWAYS CHECKED LAST WEEK DID A RETURN ON A DEFECTIVE TUBE also had to remove front brake because the space between the rotor and brake is incredibly close SO UNLESS YOUR HANDY WITH TOOLS AND YOU HAVE ATLEAST 6 (7.99EACH) TUBES AT YOUR DISPOSAL AT ALL TIMES ID WAIT TO BUY 100% HONEST AND WITH THAT SAID IT HAS TAKEN ME TO AND FROM WORK ALOT 8 MILE ROUND TRIP FOR SOMETIMES WEEKS AT A TIME🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥😆😆😆👻👻👻👻👻
customer_reviews.author: bwash1134

customer_reviews.title: Love the product but had to return twice
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but had to return twice. First time air entry cap too close to wheel and could not put air in Second time something either wrong with battery, charger or connect point. 10 year old used it for a few minutes til I noticed the tire needed air and that when I saw the problem Only thing I would suggest to seller is to improve quality control and inspect more carefully before shipping. Whoever they have putting this together before shipping is careless
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this scooter but Back tire blows out alot
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this for almost a year and had amost 5 blow outs other then that I love this scooter it gets me back and forth to work great just wish I didn't have so many blow outs on the back tire
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Knoll

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: IT COMES ASSEMPLED WITHOUT "EXPERT ASSEMBLY"! Brilliant machine this is. Very fun and extremely practical. You don't look like a goof riding it either, quite the contrary. Everybody stares at it with bug eyes and their mouths hanging open like an enveous primate. Good price. Free shipping took 7 days. Rather quick at 170 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Maksza

customer_reviews.title: Not very powerful.
customer_reviews.text: We returned this one as the one we bought on a network shopping show had way more power. They both are Swagtrons, just very different.It's cuter but it's hard to even stay upright on it due to the slow speed.
customer_reviews.author: burbmama

customer_reviews.title: Dad loved it and I won't lie I take it for ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for Father's Day. Dad loved it and I won't lie I take it for a drive myself once in a while. Works really well and probably the best gift I've ever gotten him. He get's stopped every time he drives it around.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Wow, great little go-getter
customer_reviews.text: Holds a charge, does very well, lasts me a week for what I need to do. I can't park near work and this gets me back and forth between where I can park and work, because I have a bad knee
customer_reviews.author: MarkJC

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited at the beginning, but the next day of having my SWAGTRON SwagCycle E-Bike the back tire got a bump, I couldn’t even use it the way I wanted to, this is so annoying!!
customer_reviews.author: Libele

customer_reviews.title: This works fairly well but the mount for the seat ...
customer_reviews.text: This works fairly well but the mount for the seat was poorly designed, it takes a long time to charge and it will not make it up most hills. It does seem fairly reliable on flat surfaces though once it's charged.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Espeland

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Had for a few days and love it! Light enough for me to carry inside and fits one half of a standered size closet. I thought the seat would be adjustable, but it's not. Right size for me (I'm 5'4") I ride it while my daughter rides her strider bike!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Callaway

customer_reviews.title: well these bike drive nice. until they don't
customer_reviews.text: well these bike drive nice. until they don't. in my case the back wheel is making a noise due to the brake disk touching the wheel. I also have an issue with the charger. and I would have been ok with it until tried reaching out for the company warranty. its been about 2 month now and I am getting played back and forth with no results. they are keeping on finding reasons not to help. 1st said I am outside the shipping area, than requested for additional proof of purchase (whats better than amazon order confirmation?), than they asked for additional forms to be filled up. obviously they are trying to get me to let it go....
customer_reviews.author: Shlomo dahan

customer_reviews.title: Everything we expected. Have a hard time walking distance ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything we expected. Have a hard time walking distance, this is the answer for paved smooth surfaces. Can go across grass, but hard on deep rutted roads or thick rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Miller

customer_reviews.title: This bike is fun to ride
customer_reviews.text: This bike is fun to ride. It take a tiny getting used to no pedals and trying not to jerk your feet so the wheel veers off but it's a nice casual ride. It is also convenient that the handle bar folds for easy storage and carry making it nice and portable. I rode it to work which is about 3.5 miles away and I was cruising the whole way and it was nice not having to tire myself out pedaling like I used to on my bike
customer_reviews.author: ayalexander

customer_reviews.title: FUN!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike! Bought it for burning man and it was awesome! By the end of the burn it started losing speed — maybe I’m too heavy for it? Still, super fun to zoom around on in adorable style!
customer_reviews.author: G Cohen

customer_reviews.title: It charges fine. Had to adjust the brake levers
customer_reviews.text: The reason that I am giving this cycle one star is because when it first arrived I thought everything was ok with the bike. Gave it to my wife for her birthday. Open it out of the box and charge it up. It charges fine. Had to adjust the brake levers. Fine. The seat is installed crooked. Thats the first thing that went wrong. There is no way to straighten the seat. The back tire wont hold air. Come to find out that the valve stem is crooked and is rammed up against a bolt. Cant add air. Cant move valve stem. Stuck with a bike that my wife cannot ride.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: This is the very best electric scooter u can buy I had my almost ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the very best electric scooter u can buy I had my almost 3 weeks no problem it's a winner I use it for work everyday and it rides smooth like u r driving a high end car I had everybody heads turn when they see me riding this scooter I had a lot of people wanted to order this scooter it's very inexpensive scooter I will refer this to anyone that can ride a scooter
customer_reviews.author: jeff lines

customer_reviews.title: This is the e-bike to get
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my long walks to the office from parking lot. Can go a whole week on single battery charge. Very light weight, headlight is real bright. Fun to ride.
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: A toy my 11 yearold will be able to use into twilight years if quality holds up
customer_reviews.text: 11 year old is still testing the limits with this but he says charge should last longer than it does for not turning on lights or charging anything but time will tell delivered before Christmas like promised put together easy and he will not outgrow this will use into adulthood.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa phillips

customer_reviews.title: Fun I won Harley 115 for Bikers on Milwaukee reddit.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. The seat could be better also could use better suspension. But its fun to ride gets me to work and back. Getting about 10 miles per charge. Replacing the seat with a bigger one. See how that goes.
customer_reviews.author: Tweeders

customer_reviews.title: it's a good product but it's very difficult to maintain
customer_reviews.text: I rode it 30 minutes everyday for 2 weeks then its rear tire was totally ruined. there is no back-up tire in the package and none of the bike store can help. it's a good product but it's very difficult to maintain. what a pity
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Love this bike
customer_reviews.text: Love this bike. Lightweight and folds easily to fit in the back of our pickup. We've bought so many bikes and finally found what works for us.
customer_reviews.author: RuthM

customer_reviews.title: That it appears that the back tire configuration simply does not do a good job supporting a pneumatic tire!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item November 28, 2017! Very well constructed a really fun ride but the back tire continues to go flat! So far I’ve spent over $40 attempting to repair this tire at a local bike shop! They have replace the inner tube twice & I was sitting in my living room & heard to tire blow out!
customer_reviews.author: Theodore F. Haskins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great little bike....added a basket. Have used every day since purchase on May 16, 2017...flawless and dependable.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Clark

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME.
customer_reviews.text: COMPLETE GARBAGE. Weight limit for the bike is 264. I weigh 245. The bike won't move with me on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Updated
customer_reviews.text: Wrote a bad review, decided I would give some time. My new review would say that I enjoy it thoroughly. The brake cable can get hung up leading to slowness, but a quick fix. I take on buses and travel ask over the place. The only down side would be if your not a people person might not work, because you will get a lot it'd looks and questions.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan9

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Battery runs out quick and you can't take it out of the bike.
customer_reviews.author: bks

customer_reviews.title: Loved it to not regret a thing after getting it ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved it to not regret a thing after getting it it's really helpful when you have public transport it's absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a great product, lacks quality check before shipping
customer_reviews.text: First of all, one of the 2 we purchased had a faulty back tire. Now I'm stuck with having to locate a new rear tire to replace the new tire the e-bike came with. I mean really, my son literally only rode it for like 5 minutes and the tire grew a bubble and seems like it is missing rubber on a spot.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Best bike only bike ull need
customer_reviews.text: Love love. Love this bike. Mad swag super fast no helmet needed... well not for me. Get so many compliments daily. All eyes be on me when im riding i, How it should be 24/7 anyways WHAT WHAT!!
customer_reviews.author: Derek dambrosio

customer_reviews.title: Head Turner
customer_reviews.text: HEAD TURNER.. I'm 36 and this bike stops cars and people wherever I go. Smiles everywhere. Everyone wants to know where did I get it and how much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Works well even in hill area
customer_reviews.text: This ebike works amazingly well! I was worried if the motor is strong enough to climb inclines. It turned out that everything goes well no matter when climbing a hill or crossing a busy area! FYI I am 180 lbs. Extremely satisfied with the power of the motor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: The product was defective and I could not reach the manufacturer by phone, email or text.
customer_reviews.author: Justice

customer_reviews.title: only thing is that the tire valves are super close to the rim so it’s hard to fill ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m a truck driver and I brought this because I needed somthing small and light weight , able to be stowed away under my bunk and able to get me where I need to go from my truck ( a couple blocks ofcourse) it has gotten the job done so far ... only thing is that the tire valves are super close to the rim so it’s hard to fill with air ( but it can be done with some wiggling)
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne gaskins

customer_reviews.title: Has to be better products out there. Any suggestions?
customer_reviews.text: ships me a garbage ecycle. Sons christmas present. Front tire will not hold air. Rear tire air fill nozzle wedged against brake/wheel bolt. No room for filling-cant even get cap back on! No quality control. If you look back on the earlier reviews you will see the same exact problem with the valve stem on the rear wheel. Over a year ago there are comments about this problem. Swag Tron obviously has made no effort to correct this.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great little bike
customer_reviews.text: A great bike, we liked it so much, we bought two. It is light / small and very easy to transport. We travel in an RV, it will be very useful in and around campgrounds. We are planning to exercise our Huskies, using a springer bike attachment.
customer_reviews.author: darlene morris

customer_reviews.title: Great compact e-bike
customer_reviews.text: I love my swagtron electric bike it gets me where I need to go and I can always charge her up when I get to where I go with the app it will do 18 miles per
customer_reviews.author: Broderick Barnville

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build
customer_reviews.text: Easy to build, easy to ride. The only issue we’ve had is just that the back tire loses air a little quicker than the front but we have people ride it all day and majority of them are tall make adults, haha. We use it for work going between offices and it’s fun!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Talbot

customer_reviews.title: It's been great. We have had a lot of fun on ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had them for a couple months now. It's been great. We have had a lot of fun on them. I have not had any problems with the tires like other have stated. A+ from me!
customer_reviews.author: Waynesoffroad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great bike for my purposes - short flat hops -
customer_reviews.author: Michael N.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it's great E-bike I'm 5 11 and still fit really good.
customer_reviews.author: bomee hong

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: batteries didn't last too long and had difficulty with any incline
customer_reviews.author: momsreview

customer_reviews.title: (Just be sure to inflate the tires pretty hard, makes a big difference on speed) - ...
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 of these swag cycles , they are a blast ! So many people want to check it out . (Just be sure to inflate the tires pretty hard , makes a big difference on speed) - lots of fun
customer_reviews.author: Keith bemis

customer_reviews.title: Winner in Miami Beach。
customer_reviews.text: My neighborhood is all flat streets with the exception of the bridges I have to take to get on and off my island but it handles the incline on this well. I'm 5'11 159 lbs and I'm able to use it for short trips to the grocery store. I am able to fit it in the grocery basket, so it's with me while I'm shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Aristotle Olay

customer_reviews.title: Worth it !
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together, fun to ride and a great design . Wish there was a better place to rest your feet other than the front pegs , but this isn’t an issue just a minor inconvenience. My son is 9 and this suits him perfectly .
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice toy and good transportation on level roads
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice toy and good transportation on level roads. It just can't climb the hill, the claimed climbing angle is 12 degrees, but it actually stalls at 7 degrees incline, unless you are only 50 lb. wish the motor was more powerful. By the way the user manual says the motor is 250w, but the motor is actually 350w, it's marked right on the rim or the hub motor. I would rate it 7 stars if it could really climb 12 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Fun big boy toy
customer_reviews.text: Fun big boy toy, but now has been taken over by my 12 year old. He loves it and we are very happy with this. I love the headlight as it can be seen what seems a quarter mile away and makes an additional safety feature. It charges relatively fast and my son gets a lot of ride time as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rear tire
customer_reviews.text: I bought this e-bike 3 weeks ago and flat tire twice. The rear tire is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Holy zhu

customer_reviews.title: Fun bike
customer_reviews.text: Bike came on time. Was packaged well and securely. The bike was very easy to set up and drives well. I like how compact it is. It's a very fun ride. My two kids love it and had so much fun riding it.
customer_reviews.author: Cat M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this little bike!
customer_reviews.text: Really love riding this thing! Very sturdy but light and seems to be handling NYC streets pretty well. Makes my commute to work and the gym a whole lot faster and even more fun. Takes a little getting used to in terms of balancing and turning but not too difficult. Brakes are so well done on this bike. Immediate stopping power. Makes you more confident if you have to take it to the streets with cars. Horn is nice and loud and the headlight is pretty bright. Even the kickstand is well done and just awesome. Highly recommend especially if you have a lot of walking you want to overcome in your commute.
customer_reviews.author: kiefer292

customer_reviews.title: Swagcycle
customer_reviews.text: 1st time charging was 5 hours. Fast on flat land But bit slow on going up hills. Went a 1 1/2 miles in 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda L Conley

customer_reviews.title: It's Crap!
customer_reviews.text: It didn't even make up the street and back I had to carry it. Whoever said this thing works is a liar
customer_reviews.author: S. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great little bike as long as yoi dont go up ...
customer_reviews.text: Great little bike as long as yoi dont go up any inclines. My driveway goes up slightly and I mean just a little but the bike can't make it up without some serious ground pushes from the rider. Not worth $400 ÷(
customer_reviews.author: Susan C. Hall

customer_reviews.title: not to happy
customer_reviews.text: well havent used it yet cause i just opened it and the back tire was off the rim and a big rip in the inner tube so what can i say not to happy had to cut tje box cause it was really tight to pull out wondering if someone can get back with me to fix this problem
customer_reviews.author: brian wagner

customer_reviews.title: fun while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it and so did I. Rear wheel locked up and stopped working after a few months. Called manufacturer and I had to bear the expense of shipping it back to get it fixed. Requested a refund instead.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had to fix the back tire as the tube was off. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the battery not charging.
customer_reviews.text: Brought this bike in 1/17. Love it the first few months. Left it fully charged while on vacation and when I came back the thing would not charge anymore. Sent it back for a RMA. Hopefully they can fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy H.

customer_reviews.title: so the power to go up hill is pretty limited. Other than that "SWAG-A-LICIOUS" 30# weight
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, I'm almost 200#, so the power to go up hill is pretty limited. Other than that "SWAG-A-LICIOUS" 30# weight, fits easily in the trunk-good quality build & materials LOVE LOVE LOVE IT (just wish it had a little better up-hill ability
customer_reviews.author: Fog City TJ

customer_reviews.title: The ebike is great and all but i had one issue which was ...
customer_reviews.text: The ebike is great and all but i had one issue which was one of the pedals that came mess up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: these are easy to break down and store in the camper
customer_reviews.text: We’re having a blast! We full time work camp and travel every 3 months, these are easy to break down and store in the camper
customer_reviews.author: Roberta B.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: just received. cannot run. only can accelerate for seconds. so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Eason Jing

customer_reviews.title: Why it's not charging, was the charger inspected before being sent?😢
customer_reviews.text: I loved the bike, but there was no manual., The battery charger did not work. Need to talk to someone so I can get my bike on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Gifford

customer_reviews.title: Unnecessary
customer_reviews.text: Less than a month and one of thewells didn't work..
customer_reviews.author: Hector Moreno

customer_reviews.title: STOP WHAT YOU ARE DOING AND DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: It work good the first month and then it just stoped working and wold not charge. SAVE YOUR MONEY!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rayna Abboud

customer_reviews.title: Rear tire - have been having the bike now for ...
customer_reviews.text: Rear tire - have been having the bike now for 3 weeks and each time it is used the back tire needs to be filled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Power and stability are insufficient for the advertised weight capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Askew

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last as it says it will! 😡
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. I am a woman who weighs about 125lbs, and I tried to use it to go to my job which is about 5 miles away. I can get only 2 miles out of it before he completely dies. And becomes a heavy weight that you now have to walk the rest of your destination.. If you only need to ride about 1.5 miles, you’re good! Otherwise not worth the effort! Fun if you just want to ride around the block.
customer_reviews.author: Jami

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun. would like the seat to be adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun.would like the seat to be adjustable,and the battery charger built in,like most of your others.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Fireman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool. Works good .
customer_reviews.text: I love it, bigger than I thought, seemed well made and works fine on the first day. I hope it works as good down the road. Using it at a marina to get around.
customer_reviews.author: gary S

customer_reviews.title: Back tire blew out
customer_reviews.text: Works great, just make sure to inflate the tires to the correct psi before riding it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Small and right sized. 27 pounds.
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased. It is fun to ride. I am not sure it could travel five miles. I have gone one mile on a level paved road.
customer_reviews.author: Leo H.

customer_reviews.title: The bike is pretty awesome. Just a little heavier than I expected
customer_reviews.text: The bike is pretty awesome. Just a little heavier than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: K W

customer_reviews.title: The swagtron scooter can do uphill easily without any sweat
customer_reviews.text: This ebike is really weak, can't even do slight uphills. The swagtron scooter can do uphill easily without any sweat, but this bike can't even move uphill. disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jake Applebaum

customer_reviews.title: Be warned -- super hard to pump air into front tire. Bike itself is fun, though.
customer_reviews.text: The bike doesn't go as fast as it is advertised. The bike came with tires only half-full. The front tire is impossible to pump and customer service at Swagtron is confused by what I mean when I tell them I can't put in a pump to fit the nozzle. The bike itself is fun, but the design could be better. Maybe I'll give them five stars when someone at Swagtron figures out how I can pump air into one of their own products.
customer_reviews.author: K. L.

customer_reviews.title: I am a 26 year old man (6'7" / 233 lbs) and this bad boy fits the bill
customer_reviews.text: Two words, HOLY COW...I am a 26 year old man (6'7" / 233 lbs) and this bad boy fits the bill. In my 26 even years of living, this is my first purchase to where every dollar spent was well worth it. The only negative aspect is I wish it had a basket and/or rear pegs for trailing my elderly mother (she can fit in a basket). GREAT JOB SWAGTRON. KEEP CALM AND SWAG ON
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this e-bike , I’m 170lb still can ride over 10mph
customer_reviews.author: Zequan L.

customer_reviews.title: Bobby Jackson
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike. I am a Season ticket Holder and I ride my bike from the parking space to Wrigley Field and people think it is Cool!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert H. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great compact e-bike!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Swagcycle! It is incredibly fun to ride.
customer_reviews.author: Nombre de Pluma

product_meta.title: SWAGTRON SwagCycle E-Bike – Folding Electric Bicycle with 10 Mile Range, Collapsible Frame, and Handlebar Display (Black)
product_meta.description:
Sexy meets sleek with the new SWAGTRON Swagcycle. The SWAGTRON SwagCycle is an affordable, compact, zero emissions, personal transportation device that looks like a bicycle but rides like a motorcycle. The SwagCycle electric motorbike uses a high-capacity 36v lithium-ion battery that’ll help you make your way to class, journey from the subway to work, or even just ride through your neighborhood while recharging in as little as 2.5 hours.

Feel the wind in your hair, and the Swagcycle below your feet as you and your friends ride Swagcycle electric bicycles on adventures all through the city, whether it be through bike paths, parks, or city sidewalks.

Whether you’re a young adventurer, college student or a commuting adult, the SwagCycle motor bicycle combines the best of both worlds. The 29 lb aerospace grade aluminum frame folds for convenient storage and portability and can support up to 264 lbs. From the handle bars you can accelerate, brake, check the status of the battery, turn on the headlight, and even honk the horn.

Push the Swagcycle to its 10 MPH limit on the hill and zip past other bikers struggling to pedal, or dash through city streets as you effortlessly fly past all the other cars stuck in traffic.

The SwagCycle e-cycle was designed for the modern commuter and comes equipped with a USB outlet to charge your electronic devices, so you always have energy wherever you go. The SwagCycle power bike can help you navigate through traffic, cut down on your commute, and save you money as well, all while being ecco-friendlly.

Each SwagCycle is covered by a 1-year limited warranty from SWAGTRON.

Cool. Sexy. Effortless. That’s SwagCycle. Order your SwagCycle today!
feature_bullets: 10 MPH & 10 MILE RANGE - The motorized bicycle uses a 36v battery & a 250-watt motor that charges in 2.5 hours.
COLLAPSES FOR EASY STORAGE - The folding bike uses an aerospace grade aluminum frame & easily fits in trunks of all sizes.
HANDLEBAR DISPLAY – Check battery life, turn on the headlight, honk the horn, accelerate, & brake all from the handlebars. Wheel Size - Front - 12 inch, Rear - 10 inch. Charging Time - 2.5 - 4 Hours
CHARGE YOUR DEVICES ON THE GO – A micro USB charging port enables you to charge your devices while you ride.
ZERO EMISSIONS – The eco-friendly Swagger is 100% electric & emissions free, saving both your wallet & the environment.
